DOC.brief_summary: This study is being conducted to evaluate the safety and tolerability of ascending multiple oral doses of SCA-136 adminstered to healthy Japanese and non-Japanese female subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Safety and Tolerability of SCA-136 in Healthy Japanese and Non-Japanese Female Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese women or nonJapanese of child bearing potential using nonhormonal contraceptives. Japanese female subjects are defined as being born in Japan but living outside of Japan for less than 5 years. Any significant disease. Positive urine drug screen, increased liver funtion tests, use of prescription drugs.
